sentences.en: As Cinderella sits crying in the garden, her fairy godmother appears, and promised to provide Cinderella with everything she needs to go to the ball, but only on two conditions.
sentences.cn: 灰姑娘在花园里伤心的哭泣，这时她的精灵教母出现了，答应给她提供她参加舞会所需的一切，但有两个条件。

sentences.en: Cinderella was broken - hearted. At that time, her fairy godmother appeared.
sentences.cn: 灰姑娘非常地伤心,这时, 教母出现了.

sentences.en: Dinner was over; and my Godmother and I were sitting at the table before the fire.
sentences.cn: 晚饭吃过了, 我和教母坐在桌子旁边,面对着炉火.

sentences.en: Fairy godmother: Come now. Dry those tears. We have work to do.
sentences.cn: 仙女教母: 过来. 擦干眼泪. 我们还有活儿要干呢.

sentences.en: Fairy Godmother: Nothing, my dear Oh, now you don't really mean that.
sentences.cn: 仙女教母: 什么都不相信吗, 亲爱的噢, 你不是真的这样想的.

sentences.en: I said, " Oh, dear godmother, tell me, pray do tell me, did mama die on my birthday? "
sentences.cn: 我说: “ 噢, 亲爱的教母, 告诉我, 求求你告诉我, 妈妈是在我生日的那一天死的 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: I think it was my fairy godmother who put it there.
sentences.cn: 我想那一定是我的守护仙女放在那儿的].

sentences.en: In the case of Roman Catholics, the parents of the child will select a godfather and a godmother and this will be announced at the ceremony.
sentences.cn: 如若是罗马天主教徒，父母就会为孩子选择一位教父和一位教母，并会在仪式上将此事进行宣布。

sentences.en: My godmother never gives me anything but a mingy ten shillings at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我的教母除了在圣诞节很吝啬地给我十个先令外,什么也不给我.

sentences.en: Pamela: It'sure is . I think my godmother has brought all this rain.
sentences.cn: 潘蜜拉: 真的,我想这场雨一定是我的守护仙女带来的.

sentences.en: She was a fairy godmother to her poorer friends.
sentences.cn: 她经常接济那些手头拮据的朋友.

sentences.en: The author of Silent Spring was godmother to the environmental movement.
sentences.cn: 寂静的春天>作者是教母的环保运动.

sentences.en: The duty of a godmother is to make you learn your catechism.
sentences.cn: 教母的职责是帮助你学好教义问答.

sentences.en: The fairy godmother's magic charm turned Cinderella's rags into a beautiful gown.
sentences.cn: 神仙教母的魔法使灰姑娘的破烂衣衫变成了一件漂亮的长外衣.

sentences.en: The Futher Education Funding Council: Futher Education's Fairy Godmother?
sentences.cn: 汤尧英国基金拨款委员会: 是扩充教育的救星 吗 ?

sentences.en: The woman I regarded as my fairy godmother was Sybil. She was wonderful to me.
sentences.cn: 被我视为贵人的女子叫西比尔。她待我好极了。

sentences.en: You have devoured all when you were standing godmother.
sentences.cn: 你在去当什么教母的时候,把这猪油全吃光了!

phrases.tran_cn: n. 充当临死孩童教母的仙女

trans.tran_cn: 教母，意想不到的恩人，危难时提供帮助的救星
当…的教母；作…的女监护人
